ValidationRule.description: makes sure large format are put in the first 2 products. This ensures that the approval process, which only looks at first 2 products (Done to keep size of formula within limits), is able to determine it is a large format process.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
Contains(Product_Name_3__r.Name , 'CDE7' ) || Contains(Product_Name_3__r.Name , 'CDE8' ) || Contains(Product_Name_3__r.Name , 'CDP9' ) ||
Contains(Product_Name_4__r.Name , 'CDE7' ) || Contains(Product_Name_4__r.Name , 'CDE8' ) || Contains(Product_Name_4__r.Name , 'CDP9' ) ||
Contains(Product_Name_5__r.Name , 'CDE7' ) || Contains(Product_Name_5__r.Name , 'CDE8' ) || Contains(Product_Name_5__r.Name , 'CDP9' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
Please list large format displays in the first product.
Sorry for the inconvenience but it is necessary, I promise!
Thank You.
